author: petar
title: fund a project to package Gov4Git as GitHub Marketplace App
description:
## Motivation

Packaging Gov4Git as GitHub Marketplace App will enable users to use it entirely from within GitHub, without having to install the Gov4Git desktop app. 

## Technical spec

The technical details of this project are given here: https://github.com/gov4git/gov4git/issues/201

## Sourcing developers

Some potential places where developers can be sourced for this project:
- https://quira.sh/
- https://weworkremotely.com/
- https://stackoverflow.jobs/
- https://opencollective.com/
- https://www.fossjobs.net/
- https://www.toptal.com/
- https://gun.io/
